# babel-plugin-offside-js
Babel offside (indention) Javascript syntax extension.



#### Original:

```javascript
function outer(mind) ::
  console.log @
    'what', 'would', 
    'you', 'do?'


  if mind < 'blown' ::
    return false
  else ::
    console.log @ 
      'write more code?',
      Math.max @
        1,
        2,
        3,

  fs.readFile @ `${__dirname}/example1.js`, 'utf-8', (err, data) => ::
    try ::
      console.log @ data
    catch err ::
      console.error @ err
```



#### Transformed:

```javascript
function outer(mind) {
  console.log('what', 'would', 'you', 'do?');

  if (mind < 'blown') {
    return false;
  } else {
    console.log('write more code?', Math.max(1, 2, 3));
  }

  fs.readFile(`${ __dirname }/example1.js`, 'utf-8', (err, data) => {
    try {
      console.log(data);
    } catch (err) {
      console.error(err);
    }
  });
}
//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64,
```
